Summary: Bright orange light traveling through sky then disappearing.
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i saw this on christmas eve as we were sitting in a parking lot. the location was in kingsport, tn approximately 8:50 pm 12\24\11. we saw the bright orange light path twice and recorded it the second time. (i zoomed in so the video really doesnt show perception clearly.) it followed the same path both times and quickly disappeared both times. it started low in the sky and traveled upwards and abruptly disappeared. it followed the same path twice. after watching the video, it shows it changing colors. there could be an explanation of what this is, but we couldnt come up with one. any suggestions?
